message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you great value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for this product. However, $12,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

I understand that $12,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I can meet you in the middle at $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  However, $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500. This feels like a fair price point that considers the value of the product while staying within my budget.  Let's see if we can finalize the deal.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $10,750. This is a bit closer to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make a concession to finalize the deal. Let's see if we can get it done.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down in price. $10,750 is getting closer, but I'm still hoping we can find a final price that works for both of us. My final offer is $10,250.  This is a very fair price considering the value of the product and my budget.  I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,250. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll meet you at $10,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
